testCases.description: The API should should not allow users to add a product to the cart if not logged In
The API should should allow users to add a product to the cart by passing the productId and quantity as query parameters.
The API should should allow a logged in user to delete a cart item from the cart by passing cart item id as params
The API should should allow a logged in user to delete a cart item from the cart by passing invalid cart item id as params
